this point  but I ll do my best to keep the order of shit in order  that happened in the past week Tuesday I fell ill SO broke up with me   My bed broke  forcing me to sleep on the floor for a while   Wednesday I had a cancer scare with my dog  but thank God the tumour was only benign   I was pulled over for the first time  even though everything was resolved  I felt like I was having a heart attack Stressful   work day   My car was broken into   Thursday My fucking best friend pet bird died Friday I was suffering through work to hold my sanity  but other than that  it wasn t bad   Saturday With an essay due on the  th about some play for my theatre class  I had to scramble and was forced to see a performance that was well out of my price range  I was going to take care of it text: Since I can t tell people I know  might as well tell people I don tI ve been planning this for ten years  I set goals for myself  and have achieved all of them  I ve gotten my university degrees  paid off all my student debt  gotten a well paying job  and fulfilled every obligation I have and I ended up   days ahead of schedule  So  yay  go me  I m proactive I don t know if people typically plan so far ahead  But it is incredibly trying to wait for this self imposed deadline  It s never been a matter of things being too painful or difficult or anything like that  I m actually rather bored of this  and have no interest in putting up with it for another fifty or sixty or seventy or however many years until that last cheeseburger does me in This isn t the sort of thing you can say to somebody you know  but I want to tell people so they aren t surprised  Since people I know personally would  naturally  get in my damn way  this will have to do

text: Just a friendly reminder that you can advocate for your self academically   If you feel something isn t right in how your teacher is treating you or your assignments  ie picking favorites treating other students like trash or not giving your assignments the credit they deserve or not honoring their syllabus  then talk to the teacher about it  Preferably through email so you have a  paper trail  and can follow up with counseling or admin if they still won t budge or just straight up won t answer  It s your education  and some teachers need a reality check  They be getting a little too comfortable sometimes  You re not a snitch  you re not a kiss up  But if it s serious and is impacting your ability to learn in the classroom and or your grades  you need to be the one to change that  Advocate for yourself please
summary: If you feel something isn't right in how your teacher is treating you or your assignments, you should talk to the teacher about it via email. It's your education and some teachers need a reality check sometimes. You're not a snitch, but you need to be the one to advocate for yourself.
cleaned: feel not right teacher treat assignment talk teacher email education teacher need reality check not snitch need advocate

text: I m suicidal again After a week in psych and a new batch of pills I find myself in the same predicament  I don t really know what is wrong with me  I saw what happened to the people I loved  I saw the pain and fear in their eyes but yet here I am  Wishing that no one would have busted in on me shaking and crying as I held a gun to my head  I told them I wouldn t try again  but I feel like it was an empty promise  I don t want to be this selfish monster that I am  but I can t seem to find anything that matters  I don t care enough about myself to try  I am at a point where it s like I know I will never be anything so why should I keep doing this  I ve been taking my medicine  not drinking and seeing my shrink  It s like after I ve failed at everything for so long I don t have the will to try and succeed  I m ranting and I m just really frustrated because I ve become something I never intended to be  I miss being   when all I cared about was if I had enough time to play kickball and  square I hope you guys are doing ok  sorry for my repetitive rant
summary: After a week in psych and a new batch of pills, I'm suicidal again. I don't care enough about myself to try. I miss being when all I cared about was if I had enough time to play kickball and square.
